section.title: Viewing an Availability Zone
section.para: You can click on an Availability Zone to view its details. The screen provides you with an Availability Zone Accordion and an Availability Zone Summary page.

listitem.para: You can choose between graphical or text view of the datastore summary.
Use the Availability Zone Accordion to view the Properties of the zone and its Relationships to other cloud resources.
Use the Availability Zone Summary to see details on Relationships (Cloud Provider, Instances) and Smart Management (Company Tags).
